resources.string: After device initializing,\nplease register again the device.
The device control has failed Please check your device status
Select device and change the name.
The device name has not been input device.
The device does not provide the detail page
Are you sure you want to delete the selected device? You need to sync the device through Add Device after deleting.
※The appearance of each product may be slightly different.
① Press the Add Device button on WallPad or mobile app.\n② Press and release the Pairing button, the beep will be heard for 4 seconds.\n③ If you wait 5 ~ 10 seconds, the device will be registered.
① Press the Add Device button on WallPad or mobile app.\n② Press and release the Pairing button, the beep will be heard for 4 seconds.\n③ If you wait 5 ~ 10 seconds, the device will be registered.

① When the first battery is installed or the Pairing button is pressed, the red LED will blink for 30 seconds and Pairing standby state will be set.\n② Press the Add Device button on WallPad or mobile phone and wait for 5 ~ 10 seconds.\n③ When pairing is completed, the green LED will blink and the unit will be registered.
① Press the Add Device button on WallPad or mobile app.\n② Press the Pairing button and the yellow LED will blink 1 or 2 times.\n③ If you wait 5 ~ 10 seconds, the device will be registered.

① Make the gas valve breaker closed.
② Click the Add Device button on WallPad or mobile app.
③ If you press the Pairing button more than 5 seconds, "P" flickers on the LCD. At this time, release the button and press the valve switch to open it.
④ When connected, the antenna icon appears. Wait 15 ~ 25 seconds and the device will be registered.

① Press the Add Device button on WallPad or mobile app.\n② Press and release the Pairing button and the green LED will blink 1 or 2 times.\n③ If you wait 5 ~ 10 seconds, the device will be registered.
① Press the Add Device button on WallPad or mobile app.\n② Press the Pairing button and the red LED will flash for 30 seconds.\n③ When the device registration is completed, the red LED turns off.
① Press the Add Device button on WallPad or mobile app.\n② Press the Pairing button and the LED will blink.\n③ If you wait 5 ~ 10 seconds, the device will be registered.
① Press the Add Device button on WallPad or mobile app.\n② Press the Pairing button and the red LED will flash for 30 seconds.\n③ When the registration is completed, the red LED turns off.
You can enter letters, numbers and ~!@#$%^&*()_+=?/";:,.
Please press the connection button of the device.\nIt may take up to one minute, depending on network conditions. If the connection is not smooth, please try again.
Device not connected. Try one more time
